actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to amend the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 with respect to consideration by the House of Representatives and the Senate of rescissions of budget authority.

summary.text: Amends the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to provide that budget authority proposed to be rescinded or reserved shall not be made available if: (1) the Congress has completed action on a bill rescinding such budget authority; or (2) either House has failed to consider such a bill within the prescribed 45-day period.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 with respect to consideration by the House of Representatives and the Senate of rescissions of budget authority.
